column2: The respondents do not dispute the fact that this examination  had  not been

column2: Learned  Senior  State  Counsel  appearing  for the  Respondents  relied  on  the
document produced marked  R 5 to argue that the Governor of Uva  Province
had  amended  the said  Gazette.  It is  her argument that the impugned  exam
was  conducted  as  per the said  amended  service  minutes.  When  inquired  by

column1: this Court as to when that amendment was effected to the said Gazette, the
